usage_notes: These prototypes are embedded using Sentence-BERT and stored as mean vectors per role.
When a sentence role is uncertain (classified as 'explanation'), it is compared against all role prototypes.
If the cosine similarity exceeds the threshold (default 0.75), the role is refined to the best matching prototype.
To add domain-specific prototypes, append new examples to the relevant role category.
For new roles, add a new key with description and at least 3 example sentences.
